text: Saroj Silpikul (born 27 December 1928) is a Thai former sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre rifle, three positions and 50 metre rifle, prone events at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Thai male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Thailand Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Bangkok Category:Asian Games medalists in shooting Category:Shooters at the 1958 Asian Games Category:Shooters at the 1962 Asian Games Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Thailand Category:Medalists at the 1962 Asian Games
title: Saroj Silpikul
